channel.title: Comments on: Gluten-Free Graham Wafers and Nanaimo Bars – Daring Bakers Challenge January 2010

item.title: By: Cassie Baker
item.dc:creator: Cassie Baker
item.description: wow those r just plain gorgeous!

item.title: By: Trissa
item.dc:creator: Trissa
item.description: How great is the DAring Bakers that you get to make things you would have never otherwise tried before! Great work on this challenge Anita! Sounds like the graham crackers were a bit messy to make but so worth it!
item.content:encoded: How great is the DAring Bakers that you get to make things you would have never otherwise tried before! Great work on this challenge Anita! Sounds like the graham crackers were a bit messy to make but so worth it!

item.title: By: Trisha
item.dc:creator: Trisha
item.description: Hmmmm must try and make grahame crackers... but how hard/easy could they really be to make at this time of the year?
item.content:encoded: Hmmmm must try and make grahame crackers… but how hard/easy could they really be to make at this time of the year?

item.title: By: Y

item.description: Your Nanaimo bars look so perfect! This challenge probably isn't something I would make again, but I enjoyed the experience nonetheless.
item.content:encoded: Your Nanaimo bars look so perfect! This challenge probably isn’t something I would make again, but I enjoyed the experience nonetheless.
